line: boy you are really not a morning person
get up get up get up get up get up

so umm we’re kinda using all the money we have to do it just this one time
that okay that’s a lot of pressure on me and my uterus
so well okay so is there is maybe is there something that i can do y’know just to like help make sure i get pregnant

i know it’s such a huge life altering thing
okay each team will answer ten questions
the first team that answers the most questions wins
okay the categories are fears and pet peeves ancient history literature and it’s all relative

okay somebody call it this time
what is monica’s biggest pet peeve

his legs flail about as if independent of his body

well i’m i’m phoebe buffay hi
i’m i’m i’m hoping to be your uterus for the next nine months

umm y’know they want you so much so when you guys get in there really grab on
okay and and i promise that i’ll keep you safe and warm until you’re ready to have them take you home so oh

ladies if you miss this the game is theirs pick your category

and the lightning round begins stop it now

you bet and you bet and if you lose you lose the bet

hey don’t get mad at us
